io.spine.core

Class RejectionEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.core.AbstractMessageEnvelope<I,T,C>
      • io.spine.core.EnrichableMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.RejectionId,io.spine.core.Rejection,io.spine.core.RejectionContext>
        • io.spine.core.RejectionEnvelope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActorMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.RejectionId,io.spine.core.Rejection,io.spine.core.RejectionContext>, MessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.RejectionId,io.spine.core.Rejection,io.spine.core.RejectionContext>

    public class RejectionEnvelope
extends EnrichableMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.RejectionId,io.spine.core.Rejection,io.spine.core.RejectionContext>
    Wraps the business rejection into a transferable parcel which provides a convenient access to its properties.

      • setOriginFields

        public void setOriginFields(io.spine.core.EventContext.Builder builder)
        Sets the origin fields of the event context being built using the data of the enclosed rejection.

        In particular:

        • the ID of the command inside of the rejection context is set as the root command identifier;
        • the rejection context is set as the origin.
        Parameters:
        builder - event context builder into which the origin related fields are set
